item.title: Top 10 useless professions
item.description: Healer Astrologer Homeopath Social Media Expert Politician Search Engine Optimization specialist Patent Lawyer Life Coach Personal Shopper Human Resources Manager Did I miss any important ones? Help out by posting on twitter with the #uselessprofessions tag.
